item.description:
Let's stay warm and continue our indoor meetups over the Winter at Doggie Day on Tremont St in the S End (right down the street from Peter's Park)

http://www.doggieday....

Dress in layers as last time we were here it heated up quick - so be prepared! Also, since Rob does not charge us for using the facility I encourage you to take advantage of a meetup discount while there for any of your frenchie needs They also have a wonderful grooming area so you may want to make an appointment while you are there!

I'll have the doggie bags! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: just ask for the frenchie meetup

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: January Sunday indoor meetup
